General.Name: Anhui Korrun Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Korrun Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sales of various travel products in China and internationally. Its products include backpacks, briefcases, and sleeves; shockproof and silicon protective cases, and flip cases; outdoor and sports products; and suitcases, as well as functional shoes and clothing products. The company offers its products under the 90GOFUN and GUILDFORD brands. Anhui Korrun Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Ms. Xiaomin  Gao
1.Title: Group Co-Founder, Deputy GM & Non-Independent Director
